title: Paul Williams – 2021 Comments on Hartlepool By-Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Paul Williams, the Labour candidate at the Hartlepool by-election, on 7 May 2021.
content:
A massive thank you to everyone in Hartlepool who voted for me, and to the incredible Labour volunteers who worked so hard
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
